@@ -89,0 +89,4 @@
+    # Also remove the -R setting for devkit usage
+    if test "x$with_devkit" != "x" && test "x$with_devkit" != "xno"; then
+      X_LIBS=`$ECHO $X_LIBS | $SED 's/-R \{0,1\}[[^ ]]*//g'`
+    fi
